thank_you_message_positive: Thank you for your feedback. We would really appreciate if you take couple more minutes to review us on the following websites.
thank_you_message_negative: We are sorry to see that you were not satisfied with our service. Before publishing this review, we will contact you trying to fix your issue if possible.
review_duplicate_error: We only accept one review per person to protect the integrity.
